Articles.Content:
ok while I was flying on my final stage for my probe satellite I went to my map and decided to warp to my aporapsis. as soon as I hit warp 1000 it warped to warp 1 immediately. the interesting bit was I was above 250,000 km when it decided to do this I was using a probe core. the probe core decided not to rotate or turn or even move forward. when I reverted back to launch stage and launched the probe core stayed put while the rockets were at full blast and the launch clamps released. it was literally floating in midair saying put and the rockets were bouncing up and down making a stage sandwich I would like a professional opinion from one of the mods on here.

thanks for your time reading this

Lego8_bit

mods I used are chatter, poducal wings(something like that where you make custom wings) , and kethane
